name: Megaspectre
overview: Megaspectre is a Battlezone-influenced 3D tank combat game set in a cyberpunk environment. It is a straightforward tank battle game with simple controls and progressive waves of action. The player can choose from three tanks with different performance characteristics. Gameplay involves destroying enemy tanks which come in progressively more difficult waves. Powerups scattered throughout the stylized levels are used to repair your tank and get more weapons.
